entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ENE 67 km/h gust 103 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 110. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow and blowing snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
